title: GoogleToRss seems broken now
summary: Ack. Just when I was having fun playing with it, it looks like my GoogleToRSS toy is broken. Did I run out of plays for the month? Damn. I promise that it actually works, though :)
content:
Ack. Just when I was having fun playing with it, it looks like my GoogleToRSS toy is broken. Did I run out of plays for the month? Damn. I promise that it actually works, though :)
